# Government Tender Announcement
### Description
The [Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)](#Contracting-Entity) is pleased to announce a Request for Supply Arrangement (RFS-ASA) to provide [Teaching and Educational Research Service](#UNSPSC) to various ministries within the federal government.

### Tender Details

#### Reference & Solicitation Information
* **Reference Number**: WS3714177992
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3714177992
* **Amendment Number**: 1

#### Tender Specifications
* **Notice Type**: Request for Supply Arrangement (RFS-ASA)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Cost-per-Point
* **Trade Agreements**: This RFS-ASA is open to suppliers who are participants of the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement,  Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement.

#### Contractual Information
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2022-11-30
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2025-11-30
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

#### Contact Information
If you have any questions regarding this tender announcement, please contact:
**April Charron**
Phone: N/A
Email: <april.charron@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
